<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 583 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 140 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This armor can be disguised with a mere thought.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> envision;     **Effect** You change the shape and appearance of this armor to appear as ordinary or fine clothes of your imagining. The armor’s statistics do not change. Only a creature that is benefiting from [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) or a similar effect can attempt to disbelieve this illusion, with a DC of 25.
